tool_description: A simple rotating proxy service that allows users to route their requests through different IP addresses.

api_list.name: proxy
api_list.description: Proxy your request anywhere by specifying the target URL.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: The URL you want to visit.

optional_parameters.name: headers
optional_parameters.description: The headers you want to set. Ensure they are in JSON format.

optional_parameters.name: query
optional_parameters.description: The query parameters you want to set. Ensure they are in JSON format.
